title: Firefox me da un error en https://usuariosteleco.mineco.gob.es/Paginas/Index.aspx
content:
Hace algunas semanas que tengo un problema cuando iuntento acceder a https://usuariosteleco.gob.es o https://usuariosteleco.mineco.gob.es/Paginas/Index.aspx dando en siguiente error: [SPLoaderError.loadComponentError]: Error al cargar el componente "04999122-04f1-4012-a16a-ebd426f5991f" (ListadoGenericoWebPart). Error original: No se pudo cargar el punto de entrada del componente "04999122-04f1-4012-a16a-ebd426f5991f" (ListadoGenericoWebPart). Error original: Error loading https://component-id.invalid/04999122-04f1-4012-a16a-ebd426f5991f_0.0.1 Unable to load script https://catalogoapp.mineco.gob.es/ClientSideAssets/0c6df6a7-fba3-41d0-9468-4216e7c1b384/listado-generico-web-part_04efe1b878310eba51f6f8c6937fe81d.js. Persomnalmente no tengo ninguna idea de porque sucede esto, más aún cuando Mozilla Firefox es el navegado que siempre he usado para acceder a la web de https://usuariosteleco.gob.es. Si alguien de esta comunidad sabe como siolucionar este inconveniente, os agradecería cualquier comentario al respecto.

Muchas gracias
creator: j.olivaressebastia

title: Separately change BOTH text zoom only and website zoom to custom value
content:
I would very much like to adjust the text zoom of my (updated current firefox) browser (to 170%) and the normal zoom to something around 130-150%. That would allow me to read from distance and use the whole screen. However, firefox only allows "text-only" zoom OR "whole site" zoom (in "about:preferences"). Is there an addon or an "about:config" setting where I could globally adjust text zoom and website zoom to distinct values at once (without setting "website zoom" to 100% for example, when adjusting "text-only")

I would greatly appreciate a solution! Thanks, best regards Gregor
creator: bheliar

title: page and tab refresh when loading
content:
Firefox 84.0.2 (64-bit) in Ubuntu 18.04

I often load pages with many tabs. These tabs are NOT refreshed when loading, so data may be days old. It's easy to think data is fresh, since Firefox just started, but WRONG !

This wastes lots of time, both in errors and manually restarting each of many tabs.

I need to find how to set Firefox to NOT use old data when it starts. I don't need to refresh every few minutes or hours,, JUST when starting.

HOW do I accomplish this ?!?

Thanks!
creator: RogerDavis

title: Unable to log in to a website

Thanks John (British, living in France)

title: New MacBook Air, logging into Firefox account again and again
content:
Hello,

I have a MacBook Air (macOS Big Sur 11.1) since mid-December, before that I was using Windows. I have downloaded Firefox. Now I have the problem that I have to log in to my Firefox account every time when I end Firefox completely (or the Macbook crashes, but that's for Apple support). 'How can I stay logged in?" It's about my Firefox account through which I sync all my bookmarks and passwords. That works as well, until the next launch.

Thanks in advance


Hallo,

ich habe seit Mitte Dezember ein MacBook Air (macOS Big Sur 11.1), vorher habe ich mit Windows gearbeitet. Habe mir Firefox geladen. Jetzt habe ich das Problem, dass ich mich ständig bei Firefox anmelden muss, wenn ich Firefox komplett beende (oder das Macbook abstürzt, aber das ist für den Apple Support). Wie kann ich angemeldet bleiben? Es geht um meinen Firefox Account über den ich alle meine Lesezeichen und Passwörter synchronisiere. Das funktioniert auch, bis zum nächsten Start.

Vielen Dank im Voraus

title: Nefunkční přehrávání videa
content: Dobrý den, nelze mi přehrát žádné video na internetu jak v prohlížeči firefox. Tak ani na domovské stránce a ani na facebooku. Kde video funguje tak to je Yo tube. Zkoušel jsem obnovyt firefox,tovární nastavení,nová intalace, aktualizace ovladačů. atd. Už nevím čím to bude. Předešlá verze firefoxu fungovala ale po aktualizaci to nejde. Chyba určitě je v prohlížeři firefox. Protože když otevřu jiný prohlížeč. Tak tam videa fungují. Jsem léta zvyklí na firefox. Tak nechci měnit za jiný prohlížeč. Ale, jestli si tým od mozila firefoxu neopráví prohlížeč tak aby mi fungoval. Tak mi nezbyde nic jiného než odejít ke konkurenci.

title: AddOns and the data they collect
content: Dear Mozilla Firefox Community: My question is about disabling an AddOn vs completely uninstalling it from a privacy/permissions stand-point. When I disable an AddOn from my browser, does that prevent the collection of data/revoke the permissions required to install it? Or does the AddOn sit idle, silently collecting data in the background? Also, when uninstalling an AddOn from my browser, does that instantly revoke all collection of data first allowed, or does it still collect residual data? Thank you for your time and consideration. Sincerely,

title: firefox portable as default browser
content:
I run Firefox in portable mode in Windows 10. It works wonderfully. However, when i click on web links outside of FF, it loads Chrome. So in FF I go to options and set it as a default. In "default apps" it shows up there. But Because I am running FF portable, by setting it as default browser, it creates a new profile on c:\users\username . And loads a whole new instance of FF. That is not what I would like to happen.

Is there a way to set it up so that when I click a link in an email, it will load the FF from the portable instance? using the profile within the portable directory. Usually I always have FF open. It is never closed.

title: Lockwise
content: Respecto de Lockwise. Podría diseñarse un sistema de ingreso que permita iniciar sesión (para varios usuarios), se carguen los datos y que cada al cerrar la sesión la información no quede almacenada. Regarding Lockwise. An entry system could be designed that allows logging in (for several users), data is loaded and each time the session is closed the information is not stored.
creator: zeus.grafe

title: Lockwise
content: Con relación a Lockwise sugiero que se pueda administrar y organizar los inicios de sesión a gusto del usuario, esto es, colocar nombres de dominios, clasificarlos y ubicarlos en directorios o carpetas y otras opciones. Regarding Lockwise, I suggest that logins can be managed and organized to suit the user, that is, place domain names, classify them and place them in directories or folders and other options.
creator: zeus.grafe

title: Sync sincronización
content: Spanish ¿Por qué se puede sincronizar marcadores y otros datos, pero no es posible sincronizar los sitios favoritos y destacados? Deberían pensar en facilitar esta opción también. Inglés Why can I sync bookmarks and other data, but my favorite and featured sites can't sync?
creator: zeus.grafe

title: Address Autofill VANISHED!
content:
After wiping my Mozilla Firefox profile data everywhere, including AppData Local and Roaming profile directories, Firefox autofill stopped saving and/or synchronizing my address information. The address autofill options disappeared entirely from Firefox "Privacy & Security" section. I checked about:config, which had "services.sync.engine.addresses" and "services.sync.engine.addresses.available" set to "False". I set them to "True", but that only restored the address synchronizing setting in Firefox "Sync" section, not in "Privacy & Security" section. Syncing did not restore the address autofill options for "Privacy & Security" section and neither did changing other autofill and address-related entries in about:config. Starting a fresh new profile yet again didn't help.

Could this be caused by network-wide block of "location.services.mozilla.com" ? That domain became blocked a while back and there was no way around it, not even with DNS-over-HTTPS, but back then address autofill was working just fine without accessing that domain.

How can I bring back the address autofill portion of "Privacy & Security" section???
creator: SpektorCyrax
